Uses of Interface
org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.Setter

Packages that use Setter
org.kohsuke.args4j Core classes of the Args4J command line parser. 
org.kohsuke.args4j.spi Classes for extending the behavior of args4j. 
 

Uses of Setter in org.kohsuke.args4j
 

Classes in org.kohsuke.args4j that implement Setter
 class MapSetter
          This setter adds a new entry to a Map.
 

Methods in org.kohsuke.args4j with parameters of type Setter
 void CmdLineParser.addArgument(Setter setter, Argument a)
          Programmatically defines an argument (instead of reading it from annotations like you normally do.)
 void CmdLineParser.addOption(Setter setter, Option o)
          Programmatically defines an option (instead of reading it from annotations like you normally do.)
protected  OptionHandler CmdLineParser.createOptionHandler(OptionDef o, Setter setter)
          Creates an OptionHandler that handles the given Option annotation and the Setter instance.
